articles.author: Daniel Sims
articles.title: NASA begins switching off Voyager instruments after almost 45 years - TechSpot
articles.description: Scientific American reports that NASA is preparing to wind down the Voyager mission, which has endured for over ten times its original projected length. By powering down...
articles.content: In brief: The Voyager spacecraft were initially supposed to last only four years. Nearly 45 years later, they can still communicate with NASA from the edge of interstellar space. Now, the agency plan… [+2041 chars]

articles.title: 'They are not subject to the Geneva Conventions' - Russia will prosecute captured Americans - News24
articles.description: Two Americans captured in Ukraine while fighting with Kyiv's military were "endangering" Russian soldiers and should be "held accountable for those crimes", Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov has said.
articles.content:
• Russia will prosecute Alexander Drueke and Andy Huynh for crimes in Ukraine.
  • They were captured fighting alongside Ukraine forces.
